translated: Jump to: navigation, search mantou crab (as it is called in Martinique) or crab beard (as it is called in Guadeloupe) (scientific name: Ucides cordatus) is a small crab that lives in mangrove swamps.
original: Aller à : navigation, rechercher   Le crabe mantou (comme on l'appelle à la Martinique), ou crabe à barbe (comme on l'appelle en Guadeloupe) (nom scientifique : Ucides cordatus) est un petit crabe qui vit dans les mangroves.
